item.description:
Meet for 9 a.m. to decorate the float

We will be decorating Gordon's truck and tow trailer with good ol' red white and blue.

Promoting Wapping Fair with our 2012 Wapping Farmer winners

We walk the 1.5 mile route handing out gifts to the children.

Some can ride in the trailer and wave to the masses..



Come out and help us decorate the best float in town!

Parade starts at 10 a.m. and ends around 11 a.m.

We are done removing the decorations on the truck by 11:30



We need At least eight members to create the float and ride in the parade and then take down the float decorations and repack them. Then, one member to bring the decorations back to storage.
item.name: Memorial Day Parade
